name: Raptor Evolution
description:
Raptor Evolution

This time you will face even more enemies. Take control of this huge raptors as he hunts down bears, wolves, triceratops, and Tyrannosaurus rex.
EVER CHANGING GAME PLAY
We have designed the game so you never have the same Raptors experience twice. Each game is as unique as a snowflake.

3D ACTION GAMEPLAY
Addictive and fun controls for hours of great animal simulation.
There is also a defensive beast in the Denger Forest. So be accurate and fight the with the other zoological.
There is a hunter searching for you! Always be on guard! Run around and complete the levels before the time is up!

HOW TO PLAY:

* You can use the joystick, on the left to move
* Jump button on the right to make it fly and swipe to look around

Key features:-

High Quality and realistic 3D graphics
Realistic wilderness with dynamic run-time
Smooth controls
Soothing sound effects
Fight with other animals
